discourse_list.title: Umee And MakerDAO Initiate Dai Into The Cosmos Ecosystem

content.content: Hot off the press  !    Benzinga    Umee And MakerDAO Initiate Dai Into The Cosmos Ecosystem - Benzinga Umee brings Dai (CRYPTO: DAI) into the Cosmos (CRYPTO: ATOM) Ecosystem, in partnership with MakerDAO (CRYPTO: MKR).      As per the article, DAI was selected by Umee, as explained by the founder of Umee for the following reason: “We chose DAI because the results speak for themselves: it is a durable product that has survived many market downturns. This is because MakerDAO considerably overcompensates for systemic risk by requiring an over-collateralization of Ether and other liquid crypto assets while using an aggressive interest rate mechanism to reinforce the peg.” Dai for the win!

Just want to add that the mentioned Founder of Umee Brent Xu has been a strong supporter of MakerDAO even before this when he worked for Cosmos Foundation. But was unfortunate as back then there was no EVM smart contract that could easily integrate Dai.
Also want to clarify that it was @Jenn who helped to lead discussion and close the deal. So we should thank her for the integration
Yes! I love it! Let’s go!
Here is another for piece for this deal: Maker’s Decentralized Stablecoin Is Coming to Cosmos Thanks to Umee.
This demonstrates the right path DAI is on by being a solid product. As you say a win for DAI
Yes. One step at a time!

To complement this news item, here is another report highlighting the reputation and qualities of the DAI.  Now what’s special with DAI and why is it being considered to be a potential reviver of collapsed stablecoin’s image. Well, unlike UST stablecoin, DAI has quite a good reputation as it’s an overcollateralized stablecoin across the whole crypto market with a market capitalization of approx $6.9 billion. Although compared to the largest stablecoin and market leader Tether’s stablecoin USDT, DAI is smaller in magnitude but what makes it special and significant is its whole different build and design.  More information in the link:    The Coin Republic: Cryptocurrency , Bitcoin, Ethereum & Blockchain News – 9 Jun 22    Finally, the decentralized stablecoin of MakerDAO is coming to this Blockchain! Along with collaboration with a prominent cross-chain protocol Umee and the team of MakerDAO, decentralized stablecoin is to join the  Est. reading time: 2 minutes
Excellent, thanks for complementing with this info
